title: Error when using special characters in credentials
author: dirk-schuermann
body_snippet: As the risk of being hacked increases, passwords should be improved. Especially through the use of special characters. Microsoft even recommends using Alt+0xxx codes. Well, there's a problem I've lost my teeth on. After configuration of access data in the tree (inheritance off), Windows asks for an error message about incorrect access data before each connection is established again for the name and password. The password entered there is accepted. The same password is also stored in the tree un...
